title: Club owner not in the club
body: I'm a club owner and everyone has the tags but me so i created another club for us again, will this conflict when you fix the owner problem with my original club?

replies.body:
Hello, will there be a fix for this issue any time soon? 
Or do the club owners with this issue have to live with that now?
When Riot supposedly fixed club issues i got the issue that i am no longer the club leader. No one is. Please help me fix it.
thats what they are currently trying to fix
They're two separate clubs, so no, this shouldn't affect anything with the clubs fix. I can't provide an ETA on when that fix will roll out, but our devs are hard at work to get it out.
